heldEvents.title: First Line of Defense: AWS Account Security 101 with IAM
heldEvents.description: Learn how to secure your cloud with access control, MFA, key management, and more. Plus, get tips on managing AWS budgets and billing access for total security and financial control.

heldEvents.title: Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud: Backbone of AWS
heldEvents.description: Learn how to launch, configure, and manage virtual servers in EC2 to build scalable, secure, and reliable application, This workshop covers everything you need to know about setting up instances, managing security, optimizing storage, and deploying application on AWSâ€™s powerful cloud infrastructure.

heldEvents.title: AWSCC Containers Day
heldEvents.description: Dive deep into containerization technologies and learn how to deploy, manage, and scale containerized applications using AWS container services.

heldEvents.title: AWS CCP Certification Workshop
heldEvents.description: Prepare for the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam with comprehensive coverage of AWS fundamentals, best practices, and hands-on exercises.
